title: Супербабуся
overview: «SuperGrandma» is a psychological reality from the creators of the popular project about raising children «Supermama». The structure of the episodes will remain the same as in reality with the participation of mothers: every week, a new four grandmothers with different views on life and raising grandchildren will fight for the title of the best. The heroines will visit each other, after which they will rate their rivals in three categories: mastery, self-realization and raising children. In the finale of the week, the host of the program Dmytro Karpachov will give his highest score to one of the participants. The heroine who will collect the most points will receive the title of «SuperGrandma».
